sections.text: A mechanical vine wraps around the city gate. The inventor asks you to retrieve its seed from the jungle.

options.description: Venture into the jungle with a machete.
Study the inventor's notes for a safer approach.

sections.text: The jungle is alive with ticking insects and humming trees.

options.description: Follow the humming to a clearing.
Avoid the humming and climb a tree to scout.

sections.text: Notes reveal the seed responds to rhythm. You craft a small drum to attract it.

options.description: Use the drum in the jungle clearing.
Bring the drum to the inventor and ask for help.

sections.text: The seed appears, pulsing to your rhythm, but a mechanical jaguar prowls nearby.

options.description: Distract the jaguar with a thrown rattle.

consequence.text: The jaguar swipes you as it turns.

options.description: Calmly play the drum and coax the seed closer.

sections.text: From the treetop you spot a hidden grove and a safe path to the seed.
The inventor arrives with a net. Together you retrieve the seed and return as heroes.
You escape with the seed but bear a scar. The city celebrates your bravery.
The seed bonds with your drum and grows into a guardian vine that protects the city.
